[{"id":"LR-140","entityId":"2-300","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"LR"},{"name":"summary","value":"Display message in case of weekly menu not published"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Bogdan Petryshyn"},{"name":"created","value":"1566471202504"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"140"},{"name":"description","value":"

As a user, I can see the message that informs that weekly menu on selected week hasn`t been published.

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Yurii Vashkiv"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"bpetryshyn"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"yvashkiv"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1566901827701"},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":{"bg":"#246512","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Ideal days","value":["1"],"valueId":["1"],"color":null}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"LR-133","entityId":"2-288","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"LR"},{"name":"summary","value":"Disable days without menus in the calendar"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Bogdan Petryshyn"},{"name":"created","value":"1566392274341"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"133"},{"name":"description","value":"

Days without a weekly menu should be disabled in the calendar

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Bogdan Petryshyn"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"bpetryshyn"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"bpetryshyn"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1566470982141"},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":{"bg":"#246512","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"LR-127","entityId":"2-274","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"LR"},{"name":"summary","value":"Notify user about menu being unpublished"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Nazar Vivchar"},{"name":"created","value":"1566388938511"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"127"},{"name":"description","value":"

Users, whose orders might be affected by weekly menu changes should be notified about that.

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Nazar Vivchar"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"nvivchar"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"nvivchar"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1566388938511"},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":{"bg":"#246512","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"LR-26","entityId":"2-56","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"LR"},{"name":"summary","value":"Display counter for every dish on their cards on eater page"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Nazar Vivchar"},{"name":"created","value":"1561378882441"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"26"},{"name":"description","value":"

As a User, I want to see a checkbox on a card of every dish and to be able to check/uncheck these checkboxes.

Acceptance criteria

  • Every card with a dish has a counter
  • Counter allows to increase/decrease the number in it
  • Counter is displayed as on a mockup
"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Olena Pylypiv"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"nvivchar"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"opylypiv"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1563973344410"},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":{"bg":"#246512","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Ideal days","value":["2"],"valueId":["2"],"color":null},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"Desktop (4).png","id":"7-23","url":"https://its.intelliarts.com/_persistent/Desktop%20(4).png?file=7-23&c=true"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[{"value":"eater","cssClass":"c10"}]}, {"id":"LR-32","entityId":"2-74","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"LR"},{"name":"summary","value":"Show counter only on selected dish cards"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"admin"},{"name":"created","value":"1562164049319"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"32"},{"name":"description","value":"

As a user, I can see counter only on selected dish cards

Acceptance criteria

  • Click on the dish card toggles the select state of the card
  • Counter is shown on selected cards only
  • Counter should be set to 1 in case user selects the dish card
  • Counter should be set to 0 in case user deselects the dish card
"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Olena Pylypiv"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"admin"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"opylypiv"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1563973338765"},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":{"bg":"#246512","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Ideal days","value":["2"],"valueId":["2"],"color":null}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}]
